Content.Text: There's a festival today, so the shop is closed.
The shop is closed on this day of the week.

It's outside of business hours. The shop is
closed.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the <GREEN>Restaurant</GREEN>. Come on in and eat
your fill of great food!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the <GREEN>Restaurant</GREEN>. Come on in!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the <GREEN>Restaurant</GREEN>. Come on in!
<PAGE>
...Feels kind of weird saying that to you...
Looks like it's not open today...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haha! Just stopped by to chat, huh? That's a-
okay. Come on back anytime, and bring your
appetite!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Aren't you going to order anything?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>You aren't, um...getting tired of my cooking, are
you?
Is that what you want to order?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Wait just a minute! I'll bring you the best
cooking you've ever had.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here. Consider this a gift from me to a valued
regular. It's a secret family recipe. Try making it
sometime! It's fun!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here, <NICKNAME>. Consider this a gift from me
to a valued regular. It's a secret family recipe. Try
making it sometime! It's fun!
